name: Maze Bot
description:
Maze Bot is a simulation type 3d maze game. You've to find your way to the end within five minutes. It's kind of leisure games. 

It's not so much difficult and also not much easier. You'll find a relaxing environment to solve the maze. 

You can also find two different view type. one is normal another is drone view which helps to find narrower path.

Overall, this game is a great time killer.
